meanings.sent1: She twirled around in circles on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The dancer twirled gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent3: The little girl twirled so fast, her dress flew up like a helicopter!
meanings.sent4: The wind twirled the leaves off the trees in a beautiful dance.
meanings.sent5: The ice skater twirled with such speed and precision, it mesmerized the audience.

meanings.sent1: The twirled of the spinning top fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The twirled of the tornado caused destruction in its path.
meanings.sent3: The twirled of the fan created a cool breeze in the room.
meanings.sent4: The twirled of the carousel made the children giggle with joy.
meanings.sent5: The twirled of the planets around the sun is a marvel of the universe.
